abstract: NFL Roundup; letter sent to the NFL and players' union by two members of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform accuses the players' union of stalling on human growth hormone testing; other NFL news noted.
snippet: Two members of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform sent a letter about the failure to begin testing for human growth hormone.
lead_paragraph: Two members of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform sent a letter about the failure to begin testing for human growth hormone.

headline.main: Congressmen Say Union May Be Stalling on H.G.H.
headline.print_headline: Congressmen Say Union May Be Stalling on H.G.H.
